name: Awake
description: Imagine a we-work / Soho House style space for health, self-development and well-being supported by a Netflix inspired digital platform. A gym for the soul.

jobs.title: Marketing / Project Manager
jobs.description:
Awake Generalist

We currently have funding coming in, and there is a lot to do. We are looking for someone to help with work across different areas.

We need help creating course programs, booking talent therapists & teachers, writing copy, helping project manage the concept. Essentially working as a wing person for me in making the project a reality. 

I need someone with the following 

- Passion about self development.
- Has studied/ practiced different self development disciplines. 
- Entrepreneurial track record
- ‘Can do’ mindset
- Self starter
- Willing to work part time initially
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Awake Generalist

We currently have funding coming in, and there is a lot to do. We are looking for someone to help with work across different areas.

We need help creating course programs, booking talent therapists & teachers, writing copy, helping project manage the concept. Essentially working as a wing person for me in making the project a reality.

I need someone with the following

  • Passion about self development.
  • Has studied/ practiced different self development disciplines.
  • Entrepreneurial track record
  • ‘Can do’ mindset
  • Self starter
  • Willing to work part time initially
